The Source

Second house falls on Plum Island, others condemned

(John Tlumacki/Globe staff)
A day after a storm hammered the region another home has collapsed on Plum Island and a third home is set to be demolished, according to several reports. (10:57 a.m.)

Mass. firm illuminates Bay Bridge

The Burlington company responsible for transforming the Zakim Bridge last year is behind a new art installation that utilizes 25,000 white LED lights to brighten up the Bay Bridge in San Francisco.

The Downtown Boston Business Improvement District is shuttering a pushcart program that has operated for over 30 years, angering many of the vendors.

Business

Who are the world's richest people?

Forbes launched the Forbes 2013 Billionaires List, which takes measure of the world’s wealthiest people. Forbes reported that the list grew to 1,426 names, totaling $5.4 trillion, up from $4.6 trillion.
